Name: Deceit Mask
LongDescription: May seal one of an enemy's known moves when it attacks the Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Mawile.  Finding a Deceit Mask at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
